column2: if(n %in% c("20 000 à 30 000 €", "30 000 à 40 000 €", "Plus de 100 000 €")) lines(table(format(data[data$Revenus == n ,]$transfert_facture, "%Y"))[-1]/ table(format(data$transfert_facture, "%Y"))[-c(1,2,3)], type = "l", col = color[i])
else lines(table(format(data[data$Revenus == n ,]$transfert_facture, "%Y"))/ table(format(data$transfert_facture, "%Y"))[-c(1,2,3)], type = "l", col = color[i])
